name: RingO - Epic Arcade Fun
description:
RingO is an endless and yet oddly addictive game. Tap on the screen to escape the Glowing Color Rings. Seems easy right? But after trying, you will feel how tough and challenging this game really is.

This is the most fun apple watch game ever. The longer you survive, the more you score.

Try to beat your Level score and challenge your friends on Game Center and have fun!! :)

Easy to learn, hard to master, get ready for the toughest game ever.

Features
~~~~~~~~~~~~
- Apple Watch support
- Random themes
- Game Center integration
- Awesome Gameplay music
- Better sound effects
- Adorable , fun, and thoughtful design
- Social sharing of your score

SUPPORT
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Having any problems? Any suggestions? We would love to hear from you! You can reach us at support at - contact@digitalhole.co.
